newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker final report and prices - March 24.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker final report and prices - March 24.

text.p: (DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - The Singapore bunker market on Monday eased in line with cargo prices and ample offers, traders said. A major who restarted its crude unit on Sunday was seen to be offering at aggresive levels. Offers for 380-cst were as low as $97, said another major. Other independent traders who were concerned about a near term fall in prices amid current high stocks, have also been lowering their offers, traders said. -- Singapore newsroom (65-870-3082)
